column5: Was Wondering what recomendations people would make for comfortable boat seats that may last awhile and not stink,rot all that sort of thing.  Also wondering what price  point I would be in? As the london boat show is this weekend and was thinking of picking up something up if it is a fair deal.  CHEERS Matt
pretty sure all current boat seats are made to last, and not rot/stink  BPS has a lot  also pretty sure this falls under fishing related topic
Hi  Matt, I have 2 that are plastic with bench mounts that I am going to sell for $60.00 for the pair if interested..

I just picked up a couple of these http://www.basspro.com/Tempress-Navistyle-Boat-Seat-HiBack-or-LoBack/product/30333/ , the low-back version, at Bass Pro a couple months ago. Looked to be the best built and most comfy of what they had there. I think they were $115 each. I don't have them in the boat yet obviously, so I can't comment any further.
princess auto should have them on sale soon. Got mine last year for 25/ea  I hope you like blue!
These are not the same seat. These are also light Brown with Camo pad cusions. Bass pro has them for 47.99 with out the clamp mounts
